channel.title: 667- 7** custom item adding help
channel.description:
i try to add custom items to my server but i dont know how i can do it at this revision can someone tell me in steps how to do it?
also when i use itemdefeditor and i want to change a item color almost none of the items colors can be changed its like this changed model colors ------------------------- it needs to be like phats and other changed model colors shit=shit; tel me if i do something very wrong
